lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: Which son did Jacob love more than the others?
What did Jacob give to Joseph? How did his brothers feel?
answers: A beautiful robe; they hated him
A new tent; they were jealous
A ring; they were proud of him

questions.text: What did Joseph see in his first dream?
answers: His bundle of grain stood up; his brothers’ bundles bowed to his
A giant tree growing in the sky

questions.text: What did Joseph see in his second dream?
answers: The sun, moon, and 11 stars bowed to him

questions.text: How did his brothers treat him after all this?
answers: They couldn’t say a kind word to him
They were very kind to him
They punched him in the nose

questions.text: When the brothers saw Joseph coming to check on them, what did they say?
answers: Let’s play a prank on him

questions.text: Instead of killing Joseph, where did they put him?
In the end, what did the brothers do with Joseph?
answers: They sold him to traders headed to Egypt
They set him free and went home
They took him back to Jacob

questions.text: What did the brothers do with Joseph’s coat?
answers: They ripped it up, soaked it in blood
They cleaned it and hid it

questions.text: When Jacob saw the robe, what did he think happened?
